metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3170 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The "have you forgotten your password" links in the User module in Drupal 7.x before 7.43 and 8.x before 8.0.4 allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive username information by leveraging a configuration that permits using an email address to login and a module that permits logging in.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
